content.p: Enquiries can be submitted by post, telephone or email. Your query might already be answered on our website. Please make sure you look at: Where possible we will answer enquiries relating to our holdings and to the services we provide. These may include enquiries about: Please be aware that we cannot answer general enquiries which do not relate specifically to our collections, provide professional services such as valuations, or carry out detailed research. Please supply as much relevant information as possible. Remember to include details such as: Manuscripts and Special Collections The University of Nottingham King's Meadow Campus Lenton Lane Nottingham NG7 2NR Telephone: +44 (0)115 951 4565 Fax: +44 (0)115 846 8651 Email: mss-library@nottingham.ac.uk Kings Meadow Campus Lenton Lane Nottingham, NG7 2NR telephone: +44 (0) 115 951 4565 fax: +44 (0) 115 846 8651 email: mss-library@nottingham.ac.uk
